patient_concerns: No specific concerns reported at this time
full_summary: The patient reported a previous reaction to iodinated contrast used during a CT scan, which manifested as a mild itchy rash on the arms and a slight headache. These symptoms resolved within 24 hours with the help of over-the-counter antihistamines and hydration. The patient has no known kidney issues, does not take Metformin, and reported no other allergies. The patient has no specific concerns about the upcoming exam.
